value.name: Minnesota Man Shot By Transit Police In Chicago
value.description: Chad Robertson was traveling from Memphis and had a layover in Chicago when he was shot in his left shoulder, Reg Chapman reports (2:02). WCCO 4 News At 5 – Feb. 10, 2017

value.name: Penn State to remove binary gender language such as 'freshman' from course, program descriptions
value.description: Penn State University's Faculty Senate has approved a proposition to remove gendered language including "freshmen" and "upperclassmen" from course and program descriptions, the university told CNN ...

value.name: Huge ransoms organizations have paid to hackers
value.description: All eyes may be on COVID-19, but another type of pandemic is causing chaos around the world. Ransomware attacks surged by a staggering 485% in 2020 and now cost organizations $20 billion annually.
